author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking to expand it's "Employee Suggestion" program.  They are interested in learning if any other local governments that have implemented a "Citizen Suggestion" type program.  And, what rewards they might receive. 
Currently, employees get a percentage of real dollar savings from suggestions or a flat "reward" dollar amount for efficiencies or process improvements.
Copies of your Citizen and/or Employee Suggestion Programs would be helpful!
Thank you,
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
